alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 8:55PM CDT until August 11 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Wilbarger County in northern Texas... East central Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 855 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Eldorado, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Olustee, Eldorado, and Elmer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
